trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Alabaster
There were no other sightings in Alabaster on or around February 27th 2013
Summary: First I thought it was a star or planet till i noticed it moving. It was to far away for a detailed description.
divs: sighting detailsi work night shift in calera al, at about 4:30am on 2\27\13 i was standing outside work taking a smoke break and looking up west slightly nw at the sky as i'm a bit of an astronomy buff. first i noticed the object or light and thought star or planet but the only planet visible at this time is saturn but from where i was standing it was behind me and it's view blocked by the building. anyhow, i quickly dismissed a planet or star when i noticed the object was moving. it was moving at a slow enough pace that my next thought was airplane and the distance was about right. this is where it gets strange, within 10-15 sec of thinking airplane the object or light started to get smaller moving away, but not away like a plane would more like out into space, it continued to get smaller till it just faded away. this whole event took place in 25-30 sec from the time i noticed it till it disappeared. did anyone else see this?
